title: Come, Follow Me - Study Manuals - The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
content:
Come, Follow Me Study Manuals and Resources
The Come, Follow Me study manual is the study guide provided by the Church for the current year. Access weekly study resources, lesson outlines, and supplementary materials to enhance your personal and family scripture study.
